ygData.subject: Re: Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?
ygData.msgSnippet: BIBS - location was already given in a prior email.  The Knight supposedly spawns 3 times a day (or every 6 hours I ve heard).  We got him twice within 15
ygData.messageBody:
BIBS - location was already given in a prior email. The Knight supposedly
spawns 3 times a day (or every 6 hours I've heard). We got him twice within
15 minutes, got two swords. This is rare. More likely he will spawn
several hours apart. The room that spawns him also spawns about 2 - 3 other
dazed goblins, and there is a false wall behind the green gems which
contains an alcove with 2 dazed miners. My group was in the 25ish range and
we could take all that no prob. Make sure you have root, chains of music,
etc. to stop runner or else you will have a dazed train on your hands. An
enchanter or bard is good for crowd control is you are actually going to
camp and room and fight.

Blackened Iron Armor I believe is one AC worse than banded, heavier, but has
the +ACI-cool+ACI- look, and some people pay a fortune for the stuff. It comes off
the warlord and sometimes elite guards. The King drops the crown,
medallion, and grotesque mask (not all 3 at once, not all the time). The
King is guarded by 4 elites, plus 2 in a room beyond. The warlord room is
before the King room, containing the warlord and 2 elites. I've seen high
teens to low twenties camping the warlord room since there are only 3 mobs.

Runnyeye is (on Tunare) not crowded and has good treasure and exp. You just
have to know how to play the dungeon. Also, if you camp the King's room be
prepared to fight Borxx (or to zone, depending on your party's level). My
party killed Borxx each and every time (he's lvl 30 - 33) and he always
drops the lens for the Staff of the Observers Quest.. The lens sells very
well by itself, but the staff sells for even more. He also occasionally
drops a bracelet. Polished Bone I think.

Anyhow..hope this helps.
Senjen Silentfist
28th Circle Monk
Tunare server
-----Original Message-----
From: dlobdell dlobdell+AEA-stny.lrun.com
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 11:42 AM
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?


From: +ACI-dlobdell+ACI- dlobdell+AEA-stny.lrun.com

With a party of lvl 24 plus you could easly take the knight and the rest of
them if you stood at the top of the ramp and pulled to there. Personally i
did it at around 24 but i had two other ppl with me, a lvl 28 pala and a lvl
28 cleric...

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the
universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-

-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com' EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 11:44 AM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?


+AD4APg-From: +ACI-Whitcraft,David+ACI- DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg-And while I'm thinking about it, a quesiton for those of you that use
+AD4APg-blackened armor. Is it better than banded? I heard it's about the same AC,
+AD4APg-and is a bit heavier I think? Does it absorb more damage or what?
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg------Original Message-----
+AD4APg-From: Whitcraft,David +AFs-mailto:DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com+AF0-
+AD4APg-Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 10:43 AM
+AD4APg-To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com'
+AD4APg-Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg-From: +ACI-Whitcraft,David+ACI- DWHITCRAFT+AEA-cerner.com
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg-what's the level on the knight and the other mobs (dazed guards, elites,
+AD4APg-shamans, etc)?
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg------Original Message-----
+AD4APg-From: Paul Fogle +AFs-mailto:pfogle+AEA-amtele.com+AF0-
+AD4APg-Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 10:37 AM
+AD4APg-To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com'
+AD4APg-Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Blackened Iron Bastard Sword?
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg-From: Paul Fogle pfogle+AEA-amtele.com
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- BIB is on the goblin Knight. At the bottom of the first
+AD4APg-ramp, you come to a door, a tunnel going left, and a tunnel going right.
Go
+AD4APg-right at the bottom. Follow left wall around, past the water, into the
nest
+AD4APg-room.. there's a spot on the wall.. either green or purple.. can't
remember
+AD4APg-off hand. Anyway.. the Knight spawns there, but be warned, it's a VERY
RARE
+AD4APg-spawn.. I've been there waiting for 4 hrs and didn't see him.. Others say
+AD4APg-it's random, sometimes they can spawn back to back within a half hour..
+AD4APg-sometimes it takes up to 6 hours or so. He always has the sword though.
+AD4APg- As far as blackened pieces go, elite guards and up will drop
+AD4APg-them..
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- Good luck,
+AD4APg- Needun Luve,
+AD4APg- Rogue of the Rathe.
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- -----Original Message-----
+AD4APg- From: Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu
+AD4APgBb-mailto:Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu+AF0-
+AD4APg- Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 9:26 AM
+AD4APg- To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
+AD4APg- Subject: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Blackened Iron
+AD4APg-Bastard Sword?
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- From: Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- Hiya all+ACE-
+AD4APg- I'm lookin for some info (+ACo-spoil+ACo- me,
+AD4APg-PLEASE+ACE-) on the BIBS. I know its in
+AD4APg- Runneyeye, but was looking for more
+AD4APg-specifics on the location, the MOB that
+AD4APg- carries it, group lvl needed to get to /
+AD4APg-obtain the sword, etc, etc. I
+AD4APg- haven't spent much time in Runneyeye...is it
+AD4APg-a good mid-level dungeon? it
+AD4APg- doesn't seem very crowded..which would be a
+AD4APg-NICE change after spending the
+AD4APg- last week in Unrest+ACE-
+AD4APg- Also, for those of you wise in the way of
+AD4APg-Runneyeye...what MOBs drop the
+AD4APg- Blackened Iron armor pieces? I know the AC
+AD4APg-isn't great, and it weighs a
+AD4APg- lot, but it looks very cool and I bet there
+AD4APg-is a market out there for that
+AD4APg- 'look'.
+AD4APg- Thanks in advance for your help+ACEAIQ-
+AD4APg- Thoradin of Bristlebane
